title: The call "The Son Who Called His stepfather "
subtitle: The old trick says that every time a certain message is exchanged, a company will donate money to medical care for a 14-year-old.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Each time a certain letter is exchanged, a company donates money for medical care to a 14-year-old child who was shot by his stepfather while defending his sister at the age of two.
